Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps

Class SequentialActionSupplier<T,​R,​THIS extends SequentialActionSupplier<T,​R,​THIS>>

java.lang.Object
ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.SequentialActionSupplier<T,​R,​THIS>
Type Parameters:
T - is the type of input value.
R - is the type of object to perform action on.
THIS - is self-type.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Supplier<Action<T>>, StepParameterPojo
public abstract class SequentialActionSupplier<T,​R,​THIS extends SequentialActionSupplier<T,​R,​THIS>> extends Object implements Supplier<Action<T>>, StepParameterPojo
This class is designed to build and to supply actions to be performed on different objects.

  • Method Details

    • getParameters

      public Map<String,​String> getParameters()
      Description copied from interface: StepParameterPojo
      Transforms an object to a map of step parameters and their values. It uses fields of type that extends StepParameterPojo or fields annotated by StepParameter
      Specified by:
      getParameters in interface StepParameterPojo
      Returns:
      a map where key is a name of a parameter and value is a value of a parameter

    • performOn

      protected THIS performOn​(Function<T,​? extends R> function)
      This method is designed to define a value/object to perform the action on. The action is supposed to be performed on an object that returned as a result of the function applying. The method is designed to be overridden or overloaded/used by custom method when it is necessary.
      Parameters:
      function - that returns a target object on the applying
      Returns:
      self-reference.

    • performOn

      protected THIS performOn​(SequentialGetStepSupplier<T,​? extends R,​?,​?,​?> supplier)
      This method is designed to define a value/object to perform the action on. The action is supposed to be performed on an object that returned as a result of the function applying. This function is built and supplied by SequentialGetStepSupplier The method is designed to be overridden or overloaded/used by custom method when it is necessary.
      Parameters:
      supplier - that supplies a function. This function returns a target object on the applying.
      Returns:
      self-reference.
